trans-unit.source: The DsmlSoapHttpConnection class represents a connection to a DSML Gateway using SOAP over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DsmlSoapHttpConnection representa uma ligação a um Gateway de DSML com SOAP através de HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DsmlSoapHttpConnection inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"></xref> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"> </xref> objeto que especifica o servidor para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: identifier is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: identifieré nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DsmlSoapHttpConnection inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>objeto que especifica o servidor para a ligação.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: uri is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: urié nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DsmlSoapHttpConnection inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"></xref> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"> </xref> objeto que especifica o servidor para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object that contains the network credentials.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>objeto que contém as credenciais de rede.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: identifier is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: identifieré nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor creates and initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> class using the specified identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de DsmlSoapHttpConnection cria e inicia uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> classe com o identificador especificado, a credenciais de rede e o tipo de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"></xref> object that specifies the server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier"> </xref> objeto que especifica o servidor para a ligação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> object that contains the Network Credentials.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>objeto que contém as credenciais de rede.</xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"></xref> value that specifies the authentication type to use for this connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"> </xref> valor que especifica o tipo de autenticação a utilizar para esta ligação.

trans-unit.source: identifier is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: identifieré uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: authType value is not one of the DSML supported values.
trans-unit.target: authTypeo valor não é um dos valores DSML suportado.

trans-unit.source: DSML only supports Anonymous, Ntlm, Basic, Negotiate and digest.
trans-unit.target: DSML só suporta anónimo, Ntlm, Basic, negociar e resumida.

trans-unit.source: authType value is not one of the constants defined in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: authTypeo valor não é uma das constantes definidas no enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The Abort method cancels the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: O método de abortar cancela o pedido assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto derivado <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que referencia o pedido assíncrono.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: asyncResulté nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: asyncResult was not returned by the corresponding call to .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultNão foi devolvido pela chamada correspondente para .

trans-unit.source: The AuthType property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AuthType contém um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o tipo de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType"> </xref> enumeração que especifica o tipo de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: The BeginSendRequest method begins asynchronously sending the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object to the server.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginSendRequest começa a enviar no modo assíncrono especificado <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object to send.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto para enviar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AsyncCallback> function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.AsyncCallback>função.</xref:System.AsyncCallback>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém os dados de estado para este pedido.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto derivado <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que referencia o envio assíncrono.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: request is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requesté nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The BeginSession method instructs the DSML server to start a new session.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginSession dá instruções ao servidor de DSML para iniciar uma sessão de novo.

trans-unit.source: The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método irá bloquear ao aguardar pela resposta do servidor DSML e será o tempo limite de acordo com o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a session is already open on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando uma sessão já está aberta na ligação.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the XML returned from the Server in response to the BeginSession is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando o XML devolvido do servidor em resposta ao BeginSession não está corretamente formado.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server or when the server is out of available sessions.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando ocorre uma falha de comunicações com o servidor DSML ou quando o servidor está fora do sessões disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: The EndSendRequest method completes an asynchronous send request.
trans-unit.target: O método EndSendRequest concluir um pedido de envio assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Um objecto derivado <xref:System.IAsyncResult>que contém dados de estado para este pedido.</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> objeto que contém o resultado do pedido.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: Thrown when asyncResult is .

trans-unit.source: Thrown if asyncResult was not returned by the current instance from a call to .
trans-unit.target: Se iniciadas asyncResult não foi devolvido por instância atual de uma chamada para .

trans-unit.source: The request did not complete.
trans-unit.target: O pedido não foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: No stream is available.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum fluxo está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the response returned by server is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando a resposta devolvida pelo servidor não é válida.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when abort was previously called or when an error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando abort foi chamado anteriormente ou Ocorreu um erro ao processar o pedido.

trans-unit.source: The EndSession method ends the session with the DSML server and clears the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId*> property.
trans-unit.target: O método de EndSession termina a sessão com o servidor DSML e limpa os <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId*>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId*>

trans-unit.source: The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método irá bloquear ao aguardar pela resposta do servidor DSML e será o tempo limite de acordo com o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the DSML server has already terminated the session on its own, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o servidor DSML já foi terminada a sessão no seu próprio, um <xref:System.Net.WebException>será emitida.</xref:System.Net.WebException>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId%2A> is still valid after the exception is thrown, the request never reached the server and the connection is still considered valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId%2A>ainda é válida após a exceção é acionada, o pedido nunca alcançou o servidor e a ligação ainda é considerada válida.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando ocorre uma falha de comunicações com o servidor DSML.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is no open session.
trans-unit.target: Acionada quando não existe nenhuma sessão aberta.

trans-unit.source: The SendRequest method sends a single <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O método SendRequest envia um único <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"></xref> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest"> </xref> objeto que contém o pedido.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"> </xref> objeto que contém o resultado do pedido.

trans-unit.source: request is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requesté nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The DSML server returned an error response.
trans-unit.target: O servidor DSML devolveu uma resposta de erro.

trans-unit.source: The operation returned a failure code.
trans-unit.target: A operação devolveu um código de falha.

trans-unit.source: The SendRequest method sends a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object to the DSML server.
trans-unit.target: O método SendRequest envia um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto para o servidor DSML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"></xref> object sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument"> </xref> objeto enviado para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"></xref> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument"> </xref> objeto que contém o resultado do pedido.

trans-unit.source: request is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: requesté nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The SessionId property contains the active session ID.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SessionId contém o ID de sessão ativa.

trans-unit.source: The active session ID.
trans-unit.target: O ID de sessão ativa.

trans-unit.source: The SoapActionHeader property contains the SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SoapActionHeader contém o cabeçalho de ação SOAP enviadas com outros cabeçalhos HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is "#batchRequest".
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido desta propriedade é "#batchRequest".

trans-unit.source: The SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: O cabeçalho de ação SOAP enviadas com outros cabeçalhos HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The Timeout property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> times out.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de tempo limite contém o período de tempo, em segundos, antes de <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> exceder o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"></xref> times out.
trans-unit.target: O período de tempo, em segundos, antes do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection"> </xref> exceder o tempo limite.
